IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: To create solutions that change the lives of children and adults with disabilities or other special needs and their families.
IRS990.MissionDesc: The mission of the Easter Seal Rehabilitation Center, Inc. is to create solutions that change the lives of children and adults with disabilities or other special needs and their families.
IRS990.Desc: Easter Seals provides outpatient medical rehabilitation, early intervention and rehabilitation services to infants, toddlers, and young school students. These include occupational therapy, speech therapy, physical therapy, child development evaluations and the services of a physiatrist. Our goal is to help children and adults reach their highest level of potential and function, physically, psychologically, socially, and vocationally. No one has ever been denied services at Easter Seals because of the inability to pay for them.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Endowment fund maintained by related organization to support current and future operational needs.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Trustees Robert Cupp, James Gardill, Denise Snyder and Dawn Zenner share a business relationship.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Form 990 is presented to the Board of Directors for review prior to filing.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Board members are apprised of, and approve the conflict of interest statement annually. If a conflict arises, that member is precluded from discussion and vote on that particular issue.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The compensation of the CEO and CFO are determined by the Executive Compensation Committee, taking into account market surveys of similar organizations.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: All public documents pertaining to this organization are available, upon request.

TransactionsRelatedOrgGrp.MethodOfAmountDeterminationTxt: Actual transfer of cash from related organization to fund operations.
